channel.title: FoL 3: The Bestest One [Blue Dragon and Mercenary Win!]
channel.description:
##Welcome
**Timer** https://countingdownto.com/
**Rules**
1. Follow the [Global Forum Rules](http://forum.imperium42.com/t/global-forum-rules-please-read-first/244) 2. Don't be a dick 3. Don't be inactive 4. Do not quote/screenshot private host messages 5. Don't throw the game (from Rule #1)
**Gameplay** Days will be 5 IRL days long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 2 IRL days long Actions are done by messaging me Black Rose/Cult will talk through a special Discord server Priest will speak with the dead through a separate Discord server All classes will be used, and will be used as they are found in my [Class Cards Thread](http://forum.imperium42.com/t/class-cards-for-forum-based-tol/249) This game will include various experimental classes, information below When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it
**Executions** To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" When someone is on Trial they will be able to post a 1000 character defense through me, during this time no-one should post, everyone will then vote Guilty or innocent by messaging me After the votes are revealed, the King has 24 hours to choose to allow or veto the vote, if the king does not respond the vote is allowed Executions end the Day Trials pause the counter
**After The Night** You will be told what happened to you >**Night:** You slept peacefully Someone occupied your night For whatever reason, you instead visited [x] You were prevented from visiting your target Someone tried to occupy you but you had no time for them You were attacked but you survived You were unfortunately killed Your attempt to kill your target failed Your attempt to occupy your target failed **Day:** You were bewildered Your ability backfired (Pants on Fire/Dark Rune) You've been intimidated You were exposed to deadly nightshade! A mercenary has offered you a contract, do you accept? You've been slapped and cannot vote You've been threatened
**Journals** Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
**Deathnotes** After speaking at length with myself about this matter, I am allowing deathnotes, however, they must be drawn, I don't care what program you use, remember to submit them to me alongside your kills
**To Join** To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
**Classes in play:** Offensive: Butler(BD), Enforcer(BR), Herbalist(BR), Sage(BR), Servant(BR), Invoker(Cult), Greedy(Neutral) Support: Court Wizard(BD), Physician(BD), Priest(BD), Sellsword(BR), Soulcatcher(BR), Ritualist(Cult), Alchemist(Neutral), Mercenary(Neutral), Squire(BD), Page(BR) Special: King(Any), Mastermind(BR), Cult Leader(Cult), Acolyte(Cult) Social: Noble(BD), Psychic(BD), Illusionist(BR), Traitor Noble(BR), Apostle(Cult) Investigator: Observer(BD), Princess(BD), Sheriff(BD), Nightwatch(BR), Traitor Princess(BR), Seeker(Cult) Killer: Knight(BD), Paladin(BD), Prince(BD), Assassin(BR), Possessor(Neutral), Electricutioner(Neutral), Spiritualist/Revenant(Neutral) Wildcard: Fool(Neutral), Serpent(Neutral)
**Rolelist:** **King** **[color=purple]Mastermind[/color]/[color=darkred]Cult Leader[/color]** **[color=purple]Assassin[/color]/[color=darkred]Acolyte[/color]** **[color=steblue]Prince[/color]** **[color=steblue]Sheriff/Paladin[/color]** **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Support[/color]** **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Investigator[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral Killer[/color]** **[color=grey]Neutral Non-Killer[/color]** **[color=grey]Random Neutral[/color]** **Any**
Players: 1. Bob - Dead 2. PokemonKidRyan - Dead 3. Frostwolf103 - Dead 4. deadfrien - Dead 5. Hippolytus - Zombie 6. tardispaten - Alive 7. CaptainNerbins - Dead 8. PolikShadowbliss - Dead 9. orangeandblack5 - Dead 10. FadeBlade - Dead 11. Queen_Alfa - Dead 12. Damafaud - King - Alive 13. izznorski - Dead 14. yauaustin202 - Alive 15. Moleland - Alive 16. DinoMask - Alive
Graveyard: PolikShadowbliss - Killed Night 2 - **[color=steblue]Physician[/color]** Queen_Alfa - Executed Day 3 - **[color=purple]Assassin[/color]** CaptainNerbins - Killed Night 3 - **[color=steblue]Knight[/color]** Hippolytus - Killed Night 3 - **[color=steblue]Sheriff[/color]** orangeandblack5 - Killed Night 3 - **[color=purple]Assassin[/color]** Izznorski - Executed Day 4 - **[color=purple] Mastermind[/color]** Bob - Killed Night 4 - **[color=ligreen]Electricutioner[/color]** Frostwolf103 - Killed Night 4 - **[color=steblue]Observer[/color]** Deadfrien - Executed Day 5 - **[color=steblue]Noble[/color]** FadeBlade - Killed Night 5 - **[color=steblue]Prince[/color]** PokemonKidRyan - Executed Day 6 - **[color=darkblue]Possessor[/color]**

item.title: FoL 3: The Bestest One [Blue Dragon and Mercenary Win!]
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
Just a quick follow up:

  1. Please respect the mods, even if you believe they are wrong.

  2. No backseat modding. What the mods say are final, much like a sports game referee. If you believe a mod is wrong in any form, you should private message them, NOT call them out in public.. That is asking for trouble.

  3. Calling someone salty is permitted. However, making it personal is not permitted. To quote our rules:

No hating or bullying. Troll away Just don’t make it personal.

These are pulled directly from our forum rules:

https://forum.imperium42.com/t/global-forum-rules-please-read-first/244

Read full topic

item.title: FoL 3: The Bestest One [Blue Dragon and Mercenary Win!]
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
#I’m not always right I’m just right in this case
#Let me run this by you

Everyone, save tardis and maybe Dino, knew you were evil
Those people were Dama, Yau, Hip and Mole
4 players is majority
Dino’s vote did not matter and Dino could not win
You cannot forcefully lose if you can’t win in the first place
That last line is not opinion it is fact, if you can’t win you’ve lost, and you can’t make yourself lose more, you just can’t, there are not tiers of loss
I’m closing the thread now so people don’t have to deal with you being a child

Read full topic
item.source: FoL 3: The Bestest One [Blue Dragon and Mercenary Win!]

item.title: FoL 3: The Bestest One [Blue Dragon and Mercenary Win!]
item.dc:creator: PokemonKidRyan
item.description:
Yet the developers say to try and keep the salt down.
I think there’s only 1 person here who is over-reacting.
Also, not, that’s not true.
Just because you say 1 thing it doesn’t make it the absolute truth.

You think that just because you’re a mod, you’re always right now.
This is ridiculous.
Yes, you can have your opinions, however I can have mine too.
Freedom of speech is deserved

Read full topic

item.title: FoL 3: The Bestest One [Blue Dragon and Mercenary Win!]
item.dc:creator: PokemonKidRyan
item.description:
/Glares
Dino did gamethrow but Jammy still won’t admit she’s wrong. If someone does something to go directly against their wincon, aka voting up the only person who can be scum, then getting them voted guilty, when they need to be lynched to win.
I have asked someone who is, let’s just say, a lot more experienced than her, asked her whether it was game-throwing and the answer is simple… Yes, it is.

Read full topic

item.title: FoL 3: The Bestest One [Blue Dragon and Mercenary Win!]
item.dc:creator: PokemonKidRyan
item.description:
Mr Salty Possessor?
I’m not salty. I’m disappointed.
All I know is that this ending was worse than it needed be by far for a specific reason…
But, I’m not going to be salty because I like being a calm and happy person actually.
I hate salt.

Read full topic
